Uses of Class
com.google.crypto.tink.jwt.JwtValidator.Builder

  • Packages that use JwtValidator.Builder 
    Package Description
    com.google.crypto.tink.jwt  

    • Uses of JwtValidator.Builder in com.google.crypto.tink.jwt

      Methods in com.google.crypto.tink.jwt that return JwtValidator.Builder 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      JwtValidator.Builder JwtValidator.Builder.allowMissingExpiration()
      When set, the validator accepts tokens that do not have an expiration set.
      JwtValidator.Builder JwtValidator.Builder.expectAudience​(java.lang.String value)
      Sets the expected audience.
      JwtValidator.Builder JwtValidator.Builder.expectIssuedInThePast()
      Checks that the iat claim is in the past.
      JwtValidator.Builder JwtValidator.Builder.expectIssuer​(java.lang.String value)
      Sets the expected issuer claim of the token.
      JwtValidator.Builder JwtValidator.Builder.expectTypeHeader​(java.lang.String value)
      Sets the expected type header of the token.
      JwtValidator.Builder JwtValidator.Builder.ignoreAudiences()
      Lets the validator ignore the aud claim.
      JwtValidator.Builder JwtValidator.Builder.ignoreIssuer()
      Lets the validator ignore the iss claim.
      JwtValidator.Builder JwtValidator.Builder.ignoreTypeHeader()
      Lets the validator ignore the typ header.
      static JwtValidator.Builder JwtValidator.newBuilder()
      Returns a new JwtValidator.Builder.
      JwtValidator.Builder JwtValidator.Builder.setClock​(java.time.Clock clock)
      Sets the clock used to verify timestamp claims.
      JwtValidator.Builder JwtValidator.Builder.setClockSkew​(java.time.Duration clockSkew)
      Sets the clock skew to tolerate when verifying timestamp claims, to deal with small clock differences among different machines.
